Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Northbound Reroute near Harlem/Ontario
ShortDescription: NB 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Oak Park, Chicago Avenue, & Harlem: due to street blockage near Harlem/Ontario.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Oak Park, Chicago Avenue, then resume their normal route on Harlem, due to street blockage near Harlem/Ontario.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
